home.choose_lang_line_one: To Continue in English swipe down
home.intro_line_two: I would be assisting you to play this Amazing game.
home.intro_line_three: To Continue playing, double tap any where on the screen

difficulty_level.ask_for_difficulty_level_line_two: Now we move to our next part.
difficulty_level.ask_for_difficulty_level_line_three: Swipe left to understand this game with the help of a tutorial
difficulty_level.ask_for_difficulty_level_line_four: This tutorial is recommended for first time users.
difficulty_level.ask_for_difficulty_level_line_five: You can Swipe right to begin a fresh game
difficulty_level.read_game_instructions_line_one: Now {appName} would let you know about instructions for playing this game.
difficulty_level.read_game_instructions_line_three: And to get out of this trap {playerName} has to collect coins.
difficulty_level.read_game_instructions_line_four: Well, this is not easy as {playerName} would be meeting a Ghost.
difficulty_level.read_game_instructions_line_five: You have to save {playerName} by collecting {kLevelEasyCompletionCoins} coins.
difficulty_level.read_game_instructions_line_six: You can move {playerName} by Swiping left, right, up and down in order to collect coins.
difficulty_level.read_game_instructions_line_seven: Do your best to Save {playerName}'s life from Angry Monsters.

game.begin: Lets Begin. To Defeat {enemyName} Enemy collect {kLevelEasyCompletionCoins} collectibles.
game.level_clear_easy: Yay! You have cleared Level Medium. Enemy changes to {enemyName}
game.level_clear_medium: You have moved to Level Hard. Enemy changes to {enemyName}
game.collectible_removed: Collectible Removed. Wait Until {appName} informs you again
game.enemy_down_left: {enemyName} is downwards and moving towards left
game.enemy_up_left: {enemyName} is upwards and moving towards left
game.enemy_down_right: {enemyName} is downwards and moving towards right
game.enemy_up_right: {enemyName} is upwards and moving towards right
game.enemy_right_down: {enemyName} coming from right and walking down
game.enemy_left_down: {enemyName} coming from left and walking down
game.enemy_right_up: {enemyName} coming from right and walking up
game.enemy_left_up: {enemyName} coming from left and walking up
game.collectible_left_up: Collectable is to your is {xPlaces} left and {yPlaces} upwards
game.collectible_right_up: Collectable is to your is {xPlaces} right and {yPlaces} upwards
game.collectible_left_down: Collectable is to your is {xPlaces} left and {yPlaces} downwards
game.collectible_right_down: Collectable is to your is {xPlaces} right and {yPlaces} downwards
